item.title: Report E-2024050345
item.description:
Report E-2024050345

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-20T15:12:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-16
  • City: TAMPA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 4500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO Logistics – NTP experienced a UN1133 Adcote 89R release from a 55-gallon metal drum. ERTS Dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup operations. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 1-pint of product released to a 1’ x 2’ area of the trailer floor due to a puncture caused by adjacent freight, due to improper loading. The material was dried to the wood trailer floor and unrecoverable. The damaged drum of product was placed into an 85-gallon metal overpack. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.

item.title: Report E-2024050336
item.description:
Report E-2024050336

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-20T15:12:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-05
  • City: MIAMI
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: RANGER LANDSTAR INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 9500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On April 5, 2024, at 1800 ET, Emergency Response and Training Solutions (ERTS) was contacted by Landstar personnel in Miami, Florida regarding the release of approximately 2 gallons of paint (Paint, flammable, UN1263, 3, II). The release was reportedly due to a load shift and was contained to the trailer floor. Contractors cleaned up the release was absorbents and the proper PPE. All waste was containerized in six (6) 55-gallon metal drums. Terminal personnel felt comforable cleaning up the release with absorbents and the proper PPE. All waste generated was staged onsite pending the shipper's disposition and pending disposal.
